content: sts in a row in the middle making the thumb hole k to 1 st before the bound off sts kfb twice ie kfb into 1 st either side of the thumb hole k to end of round 38 sts work 5 rnds in stockinette change to smaller needles work 1 round in stockinette ribbing at fingers work 5 rnds in 1x1 ribbing bind off work 1 last ribbing row binding off all sts as you go cut the yarn leaving a 10cm 4 tail pull tail through the last loop to secure weave in ends enjoy  © amanda hall for personal use only please do not sell or reproduce
